example.eg: Peter had a license for his gun.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 许可证，特许证，执照, 准证，执照

example.eg: Laura had her license revoked for driving drunk.
example.egtrans: 劳拉因醉驾而被注销了驾照。

example.eg: The writer took some license with the story when he wrote the book.
example.egtrans: 作者在写书时自由发挥，编写故事。

example.eg: Erin was used to the license to do whatever she wanted while she was home alone.
example.egtrans: 艾琳一个人在家时，习惯了自己准许自己随心所欲。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 同意, 允许, 准许

example.eg: The city licensed the street vendor.
example.egtrans: 市政府给那名街头小贩发放了许可证。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 许可，给…发放许可证, 特许, 批准

example.eg: The federal government licensed the oil company to dump toxic waste into the water supply.
example.egtrans: 联邦政府批准了石油公司向水供给中倾倒有毒废料。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 批准某人做某事, 允许某人做某事

dsense.name: license [sth]⇒
dsense.guideword: often passive (pub: allow to serve alcohol)

example.eg: The state licensed the sale of alcohol on the premises.
example.egtrans: 州际部门给这家公司颁发许可，允许其售酒。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 颁发给…（卖酒）许可证, 给...颁发许可

example.eg: The company bought the license to the author's story.
example.egtrans: 公司买下了该作者作品的版权。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 相互特许的，交叉许可的

dsense.name: driver's license (US), driving licence (UK), driver's licence (Can)

example.eg: I've had my driver's license for 15 years.
It is forbidden to shoot deer without a hunting license.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 打猎许可, 打猎执照
许可费，许可费用，牌照费

dsense.name: license plate, plate (US), licence plate, number plate (UK)

example.eg: Personalized license plates sometimes cost more than a car.  Some US states only require cars to have a license plate on the back.
It is a good idea, about a week before the wedding, to go to the courthouse to obtain a marriage license.
This shop doesn't have an off-licence so we'll have to buy our beers elsewhere.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 卖酒执照, 售酒执照
